attributes.action: Hgv driver strike against fuel prices
attributes.additional_details: Because the cost of living for a normal family is now at the point where it’s the choice to pay the bills or feed the family
attributes.background: Cut the price of fuel duty and tax

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
